author: By NORA MABIE Great Falls Tribune
title: Caring for 9 children amid coronavirus stay-at-home orders
description: GREAT FALLS, Mont. (AP) — As schools and businesses close to prevent the spread of coronavirus, Cal Walks Over Ice, a member of the Crow Tribe, knew the pandemic would compound stress on Indigenous families.
content:
GREAT FALLS, Mont. (AP) As schools and businesses close to prevent the spread of coronavirus, Cal Walks Over Ice, a member of the Crow Tribe, knew the pandemic would compound stress on Indigenous families.
